document.full_text: talks to end a standoff over yemeni president ali abdullah saleh's rule have stopped without a plan to resume, opposition figures said on sunday, as clashes erupted between the army and militants in the south.
document.title: yemen transfer talks stall as army, militants clash
lines_and_colors: talks to end a standoff over yemeni president ali abdullah saleh's rule have stopped without a plan to resume, opposition figures said on sunday, as clashes erupted between the army and militants in the south.
